definition: to call/to cry/to shout/to breath out/to exhale
variant of 呼[hu1]/to shout/to call out
to breathe/to suck in/to absorb/to inhale

sentences.english: Have members of your household take basic first aid and CPR courses.
sentences.chinese: 让你的家人学习一些基本的急救和人工呼吸课程。

sentences.english: He remembered learning mouth-to-mouth resuscitation in a scuba diving course years before.
sentences.chinese: 他想起几年前在潜水课上学的口对口人工呼吸。

sentences.english: The lifeguard used mouth-to-mouth resuscitation to save the child's life.
sentences.chinese: 救护员使用了口对口人工呼吸法来挽救那孩子的生命。

sentences.english: Non-invasive respirator is an important tool to treat various types of respiratory failure.
sentences.chinese: 无创人工呼吸机是治疗各种类型呼吸衰竭的重要手段。

sentences.english: When Jack nearly drowned, they brought him to by artificial respiration.
sentences.chinese: 当杰克快淹死时，他们用人工呼吸使他恢复知觉。

sentences.english: Whatever method of heating was used, artificial respiration was essential for reanimation.
sentences.chinese: 无论用任何暖和方法，人工呼吸仍是救生所必需的。

sentences.english: Special equipment such as a telephone and life support systems should be anchored.
sentences.chinese: 固定好迎击设备如电话和人工呼吸系统等。

sentences.english: McMullen performed CPR while other bystanders called 911.
sentences.chinese: 麦克马伦进行人工呼吸，其他旁观者则打了911。

sentences.english: If breathing has stopped, give artificial respiration.
sentences.chinese: 如呼吸停止，进行人工呼吸。

sentences.english: Mouth-to-mouth breathing is a kind of first aid.
sentences.chinese: 人工呼吸是紧急救护的方法之一。

sentences.english: I must try to start his breathing at once by using the mouth-to-mouth way.
sentences.chinese: 我必须立即用口对口吹气的方法给他做人工呼吸。

sentences.english: Warm the victim's lungs by mouth-to-mouth breathing.
sentences.chinese: 通过嘴对嘴的人工呼吸暖和病人的肺。

sentences.english: They hoped bystanders would stop panicking about breath-to-compression ratios—and touching mouth to mouth—and possibly save more lives.
sentences.chinese: 希望路人不要顾虑人工呼吸和按压率，救更多人。

sentences.english: She brought her to life by artificial respiration.
sentences.chinese: 她用人工呼吸使她恢复知觉。

sentences.english: Rescuers pulled the child from the river, and she was given artificial respiration.
sentences.chinese: 抢救者把孩子从河里救上来，给她做人工呼吸。

sentences.english: Assisted respiration and supplemental oxygen should be given if the victim is not breathing.
sentences.chinese: 如果受害人呼吸停止，应当进行人工呼吸和输氧。

definition: to have one stomach's pumped/gastric lavage (medicine)
tracheotomy (abbr. for 氣管切開術|气管切开术[qi4 guan3 qie1 kai1 shu4])
ventilator (artificial breathing apparatus used in hospitals)
